name: Eggvolution
description:
You play as an egg that has to reach its final form to find its mom.

Controls:
W, A, S, D to move.
Spacebar to jump.

Song used : 

baby chick sounds: http://www.orangefreesounds.com/baby-chick-sounds/

Intro: https://freesound.org/people/Setuniman/sounds/154907/

footsteps in grass: https://freesound.org/people/Yuval/sounds/206030/

Credits: 

Kevin Duguay

Marie Bois-Joyal

Jimmy Kong
